title: 15e07 - Architects and engineers.
text:
Architects, engineers,
technicians, and draftspersons are not covered by DBRA, unless they perform
duties as laborers and mechanics and do not meet the tests of 29 CFR Part 541.
(See FOH 15e15.)
html: Architects, engineers, technicians, and draftspersons are not covered by DBRA, unless they perform duties as laborers and mechanics and do not meet the tests of 29 CFR Part 541. (See FOH 15e15.)
